name: bot-deployment
description: Deploys a bot to Azure and connects it with channels
author: SOUTHWORKS

inputs.name: azureSubscription
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: scope
inputs.label: Deployment Scope
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deployment scope of the deployment. To know more abour deployment scopes, refer this [link](https://docs.microsoft.com/bs-latn-ba/Azure/azure-resource-manager/resource-group-template-deploy-rest#deployment-scope)

inputs.name: resourceGroup
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of a resource group.

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the resource group.

inputs.name: template
inputs.label: Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path or a pattern pointing to the Azure Resource Manager template.

inputs.name: templateParameters
inputs.label: Template Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path or a pattern pointing for the parameters file for the Azure Resource Manager template.

inputs.name: overrideParameters
inputs.label: Override Template Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: To override any of the template parameters, click on “…” and provide the name of the parameter and its value.

inputs.name: validationMode
inputs.label: Validation Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check for validate whether the template is syntactically correct. No resources will be deployed.

inputs.name: zipFile
inputs.label: Zipped Bot
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the compressed zip folder containing the bot.

inputs.name: directLineChannel
inputs.label: Direct Line
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to connect the bot with the Direct Line Channel.

inputs.name: slackChannel
inputs.label: Slack
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to connect the bot with the Slack Channel. In case the access tokens aren't configured in the template parameters, provide them in the fields below.

inputs.name: teamsChannel
inputs.label: Teams
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to connect the bot with the Teams Channel.

inputs.name: webexChannel
inputs.label: Webex
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to connect the bot with the Webex Channel. In case the access tokens aren't configured in the template parameters, provide them in the fields below. A Webhook must be previously created with the following targetUrl: 'https://{your-webapp-name}.azurewebsites.net/api/messages'

inputs.name: facebookChannel
inputs.label: Facebook
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to connect the bot with Facebook. In case the access tokens aren't configured in the template parameters, provide them in the fields below.

inputs.name: twilioChannel
inputs.label: Twilio
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to connect the bot with Twilio. In case the access tokens aren't configured in the template parameters, provide them in the fields below.

inputs.name: slackVerificationToken
inputs.label: Slack Verification Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the verification token from the Slack Application.

inputs.name: slackBotToken
inputs.label: Slack Bot Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the bot token from the Slack Application.

inputs.name: slackClientSigningSecret
inputs.label: Slack Client Signing Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the client signing secret from the Slack Application.

inputs.name: webexAccessToken
inputs.label: Webex Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the access token for the bot. Get one from 'https://developer.webex.com/'

inputs.name: webexSecret
inputs.label: Webex Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the secret configured in the webhook.

inputs.name: webexWebhookName
inputs.label: Webex Webhook Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the webhook.

inputs.name: facebookVerifyToken
inputs.label: Facebook Verify Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a token. The bot will use it to validate received messages.

inputs.name: facebookAppSecret
inputs.label: Facebook App Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the app secret from the facebook application.

inputs.name: facebookAccessToken
inputs.label: Facebook Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Facebook Page access token.

inputs.name: twilioNumber
inputs.label: Twilio Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Twilio phone number. This is the number that will receive the messages. Get one in 'https://www.twilio.com/console

inputs.name: twilioAccountSid
inputs.label: Twilio Account Sid
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Twilio account sid.

inputs.name: twilioAuthToken
inputs.label: Twilio Auth Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Twilio authorization token for the account.
